name: Komikku v1.12.1
body:
### What's Changed

#### New

##### UI

- **Error screen** for Library update (@cuong-tran)
- **Custom color theme** (@kana-shii) with Colors palette (@cuong-tran)
- **Panorama cover** showing wide cover in full (@cuong-tran)
- **Language flags** (@cuong-tran)
- **Repo icon** for Komikku & Keiyoushi (@cuong-tran)
- show all entries going to be checked for **Smart update** (@cuong-tran)
- show **duplicating manga cover** on Duplicate dialog (@cuong-tran)

##### Action

- **Hidden categories** to hide yours *things* from nosy people (@cuong-tran)
- **Random library sort** for your inspiration(@jackhamilton)
- **Chips for Saved search** in source browse (@cuong-tran)
- **Docking Read/Resume button** (@cuong-tran)
- **Merge multiple** library entries together at same time (@cuong-tran)
- **Range-selection for Migration** (@cuong-tran)
- **Hide library entries in Feed** (@cuong-tran)
- Add source search, icon & flag on **Feed adding dialog** (@cuong-tran)
- Easy **re-ordering Feed & Saved search** (@cuong-tran)
- Ability to **enable/disable repo** (@cuong-tran)
- Show **extensions from multiple repos** (@cuong-tran)
- Default disable **integrated H** features (fresh install) (@cuong-tran)
- Add option to opt out of ~~Analytics and~~ Crashlytics (@Animeboynz)

#### Improve

- Show **quantity badge** on Upcoming screen (@cuong-tran)
- Add option to **skip downloading duplicate read chapters** (@shabnix)
- Allow **sync Feeds & extension's settings** (@cuong-tran)
- Option to **not backup Saved searches & Feeds** (@cuong-tran)
- Option to **Always/Ask/Never update trackers** when chapter marked as read (@Animeboynz)
- Show a toast whenever progress is synced from Trackers (@cuong-tran)
- update all trackers progress when new tracker is added (@cuong-tran)
- Allow disable smart-update for individual & fix custom interval update (@kana-shii)
- Show download state and progress on reader chapter list (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Show local chapters as downloaded on merged entries. (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Allow adding multiple tags separated by commas (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- make global search pinned/all sticky (@cuong-tran)
- hide Pinned chip in Global/Migrate Search if no pinned sources available (@cuong-tran)
- hide Filter save-button on SourceFeedScreen (@cuong-tran)
- show loading indicator while bulk-favorite is running (@cuong-tran)
- bulk-favorite: reverse selection (@cuong-tran)
- Add extensions list refresh menu (@cuong-tran)
- Respect privacy settings in extension update notification (@Animeboynz)
- Add "show entry" action to download notifications (@mm12)
- Avoid blocking call causing lag when open Settings (@cuong-tran)
- allow chapter 0 dupe auto mark as read (@Riztard)
- Re-enable fetching chapters list for entries with licensed status (@Animeboynz)
- hide batch-add if integrated H & Delegated src is off (@Riztard)
- add MangaDex to batch-add example (@cuong-tran)
- Remove more unnecessary permissions from Firebase dependency (@AntsyLich)
- rename `Related Titles` to `Suggestions` (@cuong-tran)
- only load suggestions after entry finished loading info & chapters (@cuong-tran)
- Add confirmation when adding repo via URI (@Animeboynz)
- Confirmation dialog when removing privately installed extensions (@Animeboynz)
- Hide sync library option when sync is disabled (@FuSan21)
- Hide keyboard when a Tracker SearchResultItem is clicked (@Animeboynz)
- Back button on smart-search source (@cuong-tran)
- Remove legacy broken source and history backup (@AntsyLich)
- Move "Choose what to sync" out of "Sync now" (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Enable 'Split Tall Images' by default (@Smol-Ame)
- Ignore "intent://" urls on webview (@bapeey)
- Hide display mode for e-hentai (@cuong-tran)
- Reduce ChapterNavigator horizontal padding on small ui (@AntsyLich)
- Respect the `altTitlesInDesc` preference (MangaDex) (@NGB-Was-Taken)
- Respect `thumbnailQuality` and `tryUsingFirstVolumeCover` preferences (@NGB-Was-Taken)

#### Fix

- Remove built-in Komikku repo (fresh install) (@cuong-tran)
- Fix for ExHentai (@jobobby04)
- Fix dropdown menu position (@cuong-tran)
- Fix late loading saved-searches/filters when jump from other screens (@cuong-tran)
- Don't show Suggestions for merged entries (@cuong-tran)
- Don't expand description on the manga found by smart search being used for merging (@cuong-tran)
- Fix sync progress from tracker not working if chapters' order is messed up after backup restoration (@cuong-tran)
- Fix app crash when removing tracked entry from tracker (@cuong-tran)
- Safe-guard some edge-cases where chapters are duplicated causing a crash on a merged entry (@cuong-tran)
- Retain remote last chapter read if it's higher than the local one for EnhancedTracker (@brewkunz)
- Fix crashlytics (@cuong-tran)
- Fix Kitsu `ratingTwenty` being typed as String (@MajorTanya)
- Fix Kitsu `synopsis` nullability (@MajorTanya)
- Fix AniList `ALSearchItem.status` nullibility (@Secozzi)
- Fix EnhancedTracker not auto binding when adding manga to library (@brewkunz)
- Fix issue with not showing source names in merged manga sometimes (@jobobby04)
- Fix source search box's height (@cuong-tran)
- Fix settings SliderItem steps count (@abdurisaq)

##### Hotfix for v1.12.0

- Fix release update version checking
- Migration integrated H enable
- add Back button on Migration screen
- fix crash if cancel migration too soon
- fix unable to migrate after manually cancel & search for entry

#### Based on

- Mihon stable 0.17.0 (Oct 26, 2024)
- TachiyomiSY stable 1.11.0 (Oct 28, 2024)

*Full Changelog*: https://github.com/komikku-app/komikku/compare/v1.11.2...v1.12.1

---

### Checksums

| Variant | SHA-256 |
| ------- | ------- |
| Universal | 979d69cc357729161d5846aab6500aff8d78f89a32176f7a55228eaa693c1a0e |
| arm64-v8a | f802acdf36b0ff7a3cb0a158bd1fbac6a229669fe545fd5bab8142cd92ecda0b |
| armeabi-v7a | fb0a72e7dbfed270f8a0d3495307f44e0d53110f3e7f6abad911a0bae2f7939d |
| x86 | c2629e414f319af8de9ef6c7cf700463c28fbcea7a006a1558c8e0ada3cb064a |
| x86_64 | 2f95110d1f89efdfe6551f01e8a1b064d697458953084e3df78b39011622c8f1 |

### If you are unsure which apk to download then go with `Komikku-v1.12.1.apk`
